Html:
Greetings,
I am logged in as a domain admin for our network. Out of about 10 servers, 7 return successfully, writing the log and xml files. But 3 servers do not complete successfully, failing to write an xml file.

The log files generate, but at the end the message is "No Machines Found!". Is this a common issue, or am I missing something? Thanks!
